short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, convenient, and powerful bookmark management tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Killer is a sleek and powerful bookmark management tool that you can set as your browser’s blank page. With it, you can:
	•	Display bookmarks categorized by cards and time
	•	Quickly add, delete, and edit bookmarks
	•	Check the validity of bookmark URLs	
...
